comment:
по клику на труп псайкера, прикованный к машине
успех лор варпа

languages.text: Судя по выжженным изнутри глазам и вырезанным на теле колдовским глифам, этот бедолага был псайкером, и кто-то использовал его жизнь для осквернения священной машины.
Judging by the prisoner's eyes, which have been burned from within, and the sorcerous glyphs carved into his body, this poor soul was a psyker, and someone used his life to corrupt a sacred machine.
languages.original_text: Судя по выжженным изнутри глазам и вырезанным на теле колдовским глифам, этот бедолага был псайкером, и кто-то использовал его жизнь для осквернения священной машины.

traits.locale_text: Judging by the prisoner's eyes that were burned from within and the sorcerous glyphs carved into his body, this poor soul was a psyker, and someone used his life to corrupt a sacred machine.
Judging by the prisoner's eyes that were burned from within and the sorcerous glyphs carved into his body, this poor soul was a psyker, and someone used his life to corrupt a sacred machine.
Judging by the prisoner's eyes, which have been burned from within, and the sorcerous glyphs carved into his body, this poor soul was a psyker, and someone used his life to corrupt a sacred machine.

Judging by the prisoner's eyes, which have been burned from within, and the sorcerous glyphs carved into his body, this poor soul was a psyker, and someone used his life to corrupt a sacred machine.
Judging by the prisoner's eyes, which have been burned from within, and the sorcerous glyphs carved into his body, this poor soul was a psyker, and someone used his life to corrupt a sacred machine.

languages.text: 从这名囚犯被烧毁的双眼，以及刻满整个身体的巫术印记来看，这个可怜人生前是位灵能者，有人用他的生命腐化了一台神圣机器。
languages.original_text: Judging by the prisoner's eyes, which have been burned from within, and the sorcerous glyphs carved into his body, this poor soul was a psyker, and someone used his life to corrupt a sacred machine.

traits.locale_text: 从这名囚犯被烧毁的双眼，以及刻满整个身体的巫术印记来看，这个可怜人生前是位灵能者，有人用他的生命腐化了一台神圣机器。

languages.text: À en juger par les yeux du prisonnier, brûlés de l'intérieur, et les glyphes magiques gravés sur sa peau, ce pauvre homme était un psyker que quelqu'un a sacrifié pour corrompre une machine sacrée.
languages.original_text: Judging by the prisoner's eyes, which have been burned from within, and the sorcerous glyphs carved into his body, this poor soul was a psyker, and someone used his life to corrupt a sacred machine.

traits.locale_text: À en juger par les yeux du prisonnier, brûlés de l'intérieur, et les glyphes magiques gravés sur sa peau, ce pauvre homme était un psyker que quelqu'un a sacrifié pour corrompre une machine sacrée.

languages.text: 内側から焼かれた囚人の目と身体に刻まれた魔術文字をみるかぎり、この被害者は異能者で、何者かが彼の命を使い聖なる機械を堕落させたようだ。
languages.original_text: Judging by the prisoner's eyes, which have been burned from within, and the sorcerous glyphs carved into his body, this poor soul was a psyker, and someone used his life to corrupt a sacred machine.

traits.locale_text: 内側から焼かれた囚人の目と身体に刻まれた魔術文字をみるかぎり、この被害者は異能者で、何者かが彼の命を使い聖なる機械を堕落させたようだ。

languages.text: A juzgar por los ojos del prisionero, quemados por dentro, y los glifos de brujería que alguien ha tallado en su cuerpo, este pobre diablo era un psíquico a quien han usado para corromper una máquina sagrada.
languages.original_text: Judging by the prisoner's eyes, which have been burned from within, and the sorcerous glyphs carved into his body, this poor soul was a psyker, and someone used his life to corrupt a sacred machine.

traits.locale_text: A juzgar por los ojos del prisionero, quemados por dentro, y los glifos de brujería que alguien ha tallado en su cuerpo, este pobre diablo era un psíquico a quien han usado para corromper una máquina sagrada.

languages.text: Die Augen des Gefangenen wurden von innen heraus verbrannt, magische Glyphen wurden in seinen Körper geritzt. Diese arme Seele war offenbar ein Psioniker, und jemand hat sein Leben genutzt, um eine heilige Maschine zu korrumpieren.
languages.original_text: Judging by the prisoner's eyes, which have been burned from within, and the sorcerous glyphs carved into his body, this poor soul was a psyker, and someone used his life to corrupt a sacred machine.

traits.locale_text: Die Augen des Gefangenen wurden von innen heraus verbrannt, magische Glyphen wurden in seinen Körper geritzt. Diese arme Seele war offenbar ein Psioniker, und jemand hat sein Leben genutzt, um eine heilige Maschine zu korrumpieren.

languages.text: Mahkûmun içten yanmış gözlerine ve sihirli glifler kazınmış vücuduna bakıldığında bu zavallının bir ruhsezer olduğu söylenebilir. Birileri, kutsal makineyi yozlaştırmak için bu adamın canını kullanmış.
languages.original_text: Judging by the prisoner's eyes, which have been burned from within, and the sorcerous glyphs carved into his body, this poor soul was a psyker, and someone used his life to corrupt a sacred machine.
